forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.
